Text:
If you don't see a book(s) you requested it's because I don't have it or have not gotten it yet if it's a new release.

Please check my other floods before making a request to see if the book you want hasn't already been uploaded.I've been getting a lot of requests for books that I have already uploaded 

Thank You :)

Hey, You wrote "If you don't see it I Dont ave it" but....I know the big BUT.....If you should happen across...

The Inn at Rose Harbor – Debbie Macaomber
In the Shadow of Banyan – Vaddey Ratner
Skylight Confessions – Alice Hoffman
The Art of French Kissing –Kristin Harmel 
The Time Keeper - Mitch Albom

I would Greatly appreciate it!
Ever since Demon went down My ePub library has been getting skinny!!

Thank you very much.
These are fabulous :)
